description:
Valerie Lynn Fitzsimmons was an Alliance military officer. In 794 UC, she was assigned to an Alliance rear support base in Van-Fleet 4-2 as an air defence system operator. Fitzsimmons participated in the defence of the Alliance base from an Imperial ground attack during the Battle of Van-Fleet and was ultimately killed in action. A divorcee, she was in a relationship with Walter von Sch√∂nkopf before her untimely demise.
Gineipedia
name: Valerie Lynn Fitzsimmons
